body.raw:
{
  "ServiceId": {{serviceId}},
  "CourierId": {{courierId}},
  "ShipmentDate": "{{shipmentDate}}",
  "ShipmentDateEnd": "{{shipmentDateEnd}}",
  "AddressTo": {
    "Name": "TEST Carrier",
    "ContactPerson": "TEST Carrier",
    "Country": "RO",
    "CountyName": "Brasov",
    "LocalityName": "Brasov",
    "AddressText": "Strada Test nr 120",
    "PostalCode": "900000",
    "Phone": "0722222222",
    "Email": "abc@yahoo.com"
  },
  "Payment": "{{payment}}",
  "Content": {
    "EnvelopeCount": 0,
    "ParcelsCount": 1,
    "PalettesCount": 0,
    "TotalWeight": 20,
    "Contents": "Continut colet",
    "Package": "-",
    "OversizedPackage": false,
    "Parcels": [
      {
        "SequenceNo": 1,
        "Size": {
          "Width": 10,
          "Height": 10,
          "Length": 10
        },
        "Weight": 1,
        "Type": 2,
        "Reference1": "1297258"
      }
    ]
  },
  "Extra": {
    "BankRepaymentAmount": null,
    "BankRepaymentCurrency": null,
    "CashOnDeliveryAmount": null,
    "CashRepaymentCurrency": null,
    "DeclaredValueAmount": null,
    "insuranceAmount": null,
    "insuranceAmountCurrency": null,
    "returnOfDocuments": false,
    "returnOfDocumentsComment": false,
    "returnPackage": false,
    "OpenPackage": false,
    "SaturdayDelivery": false
  },
  "Parameters": {
    "Async": true,
    "GetParcelsBarcodes": true,
    "IncludeCourierResponse": true,
    "IncludePriceBreakdown": false
  },
  "ExternalClientLocation": {{externalClientLocation}},
  "observation": "observatii test",
  "ExternalOrderId": "123456"
}
